sentences: Miyuki Kanbe (神戸 みゆき, Kanbe Miyuki) (7 May 1984 – 18 June 2008) was a Japanese actress, model and singer.
As late as June 2008, she had been active and vocally expressing an interest in furthering her career.
Since February 2007, Kanbe had been in and out of the hospital until dying from sudden heart failure on 18 June 2008 at 4:08 am.
Her funeral was held in Kawasaki, Kanagawa on 21 June 2008.
